Text.val: LB 11.03.2008 This program comes to display lock of IFS objects
The Program works in two modes:
Online (pi.Mode = 'O') - Display List of Jobs that use IFS Object (pi.Path)
Batch (pi.Mode <> 'B') - Returns number of Jobs that use IFS Object (pi.Path)

ExpSyntax.val: 'CREATE TABLE QTEMP/IFSLCK (JOB CHAR (132 ) NOT NULL WITH DEFAULT)'
'CPYSPLF FILE(QSYSPRT) TOFILE(QTEMP/IFSLCK) JOB(*) SPLNBR(*LAST) TOMBR(*FIRST) MBROPT(*REPLACE) '

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT SUBSTR(JOB , 1 , 10), SUBSTR(JOB , 13, 10), SUBSTR(JOB , 25, 6), SUBSTR(JOB , 34, 5) FROM qtemp/IFSLCK WHERE SUBSTR(JOB , 38, 1) <> ' ' and SUBSTR(JOB , 31, 1) = '' and SUBSTR(JOB , 1, 3) <> 'IFS' FOR READ ONLY WITH NC OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

ExpSyntax.val: 'IFS Object '&Trim ({1,1})&' is in use by follwong jobs:'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast( count(*) as decimal (9, 0)) FROM qtemp/IFSLCK WHERE SUBSTR(JOB , 38, 1) <> ' ' and SUBSTR(JOB , 31, 1) = '' and SUBSTR(JOB , 1, 3) <> 'IFS' FOR READ ONLY WITH NC OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
